casebody.data:
Tillie STEWART, Plaintiff,
v.
James R. SHIPLEY, DPM, Instride Mt. Airy Foot and Ankle Specialists, PLLC d/b/a Mt. Airy Foot & Ankle Center, and Northern Hospital District of Surry County, Defendants. No. COA17-378 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: October 3, 2017

DISMISSED.
